channel.title: Asteroid Close To Earth This Weekend
channel.description:
They say it's gonna miss... but we [i]are[/i] only human.
http://www.wired.co.uk/news/archive/2011-11/07/asteroid-flyby
Edit, I think that was last weekend...

item.title: Asteroid Close To Earth This Weekend
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:15, topic:421225”]It’s not an asteoird
it’s a space ship with zombies
the apocalypse is coming![/quote]

And this is why our generation will accomplish absolutely nothing except for “Call Of Duty Modern Warfare 27: Kill All The Damn Zombies Now Bitch”

Read full topic

item.title: Asteroid Close To Earth This Weekend
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:7, topic:421225”][quote author=Saphire` link=topic=523889.msg3811604#msg3811604 date=1320978595]

The when is 23:28 UK time on 8 November.

It’s already passed, nothing happened.

I know Kieran, but it is still interesting. I’m not speculating anything… just some information is all.

How’d you know my name?
[/quote]
Been said plenty of times on these forums or he might have a second account or something, who knows?

OT: Meh… I hope it hits.[/quote]
It missed, as it happened last weekend, I made a mistake. Would of been cool to see shoot past though.

Read full topic

item.title: Asteroid Close To Earth This Weekend
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Why am I a curse of human existence for posting an interesting article? If you’re not interested in things like this then why bother to bump the topic? We know nothing about each other (although it seems you are ignorant), which is why I’m not going to have a war with you.

Now for anyone actually interested, browse the site for more space articles, there’s some really interesting stuff there.
